reviews.review: Top, to top, to top, top na bala.
Juego al CS desde los 7 años, hoy con 26 seguimos con la historia.
I think it is a pretty okay game :)
si es divertido y tambien bastante adictivo pero tiene muchos chiters

2 years ago i met my wife on this game during a competitive game on Dust 2, 16-14 when my wife had clutched up using only a negev and a moly on t side. She hopped onto window and moly'd car, then used her negev to spam tunnel and win. I immediately contacted her and we have been married ever since. However, recently I have learned she now plays valorant, so I divorced her and took child custody. I also sued her for half her savings and have a restraining order of 2 kilometers with her. Anyways this is a good game, recommend.

this game is horrifying toxic nobody is nice everyone is in it for themselves this game would  be absolutely amazing but the player base is just mean you very rarely get in a game with team players i just got competitive cool down for 6  days because i got kicked for not wanting to surrender i am thinking about uninstalling 

on the other hand if you don't solo q this game can be absolutely amazing

3 из 4 игр с читаками в твоей или чужой тиме. А всем всё равно

After almost 1,000 hours of review I can say this game is OG to me.. when literally got my PC in Christmas of 2016, this is the FIRST game I installed on my PC. It's a good ole' FPS game that prefers skill over pay to win.. although there is skins of course, which Valve loves the skins. 

I literally no-life'd this game to death, and I have to say, I don't like how they made it free to play.. more cheaters in every game.. and also my 15 dollars was pretty much just taken away, and I got "Prime status..." which to me was useless since it can be decreased if your not careful.. 

Competitive is the main deal of this game.. as eSports is an important factor of life for this genre. Good luck getting out of Silver, you skrub.

Ich zocke das game seit 5 Jahren. Von Jahr zu Jahr kommen immer mehr Hacker dazu... Es macht echt keinen Spaß mehr. Valve bekommts nicht geschissen die ****** perma zu bannen. Was ist daran so schwer? Selbst GommeHD hat eine bessere Anticheat Software als CS. Die nehmen so viel ein und machen nichts dagegen! Einfach nur sad! Valve größter Schmutzverein.
